title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

**Powerful Performance**

Choose from two powerful chip options: M2 Pro or M2 Max. The M2 Pro features 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and up to 32GB of unified memory. The M2 Max boasts 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, and up to 96GB of unified memory.

**Stunning Display**

Enjoy a stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, and pro reference modes.

**All-Day Battery Life**

Get up to 22 hours of battery life, perfect for working on the go or binge-watching your favorite shows.

**Seamless Compatibility**

Compatible with popular creative apps like Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, and Microsoft 365. Plus, easily access iPhone and iPad apps on your MacBook Pro.

**Advanced Camera and Audio**

Capture stunning video with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera and enjoy crystal-clear audio with the three-mic array and six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.

**Convenient Ports and Connectivity**

Stay connected with MagSafe charging, three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and headphone jack. Plus, enjoy fast Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity.

**Magic Keyboard and Touch ID**

Type away with the comfortable Magic Keyboard, featuring a full-height function key row and convenient Touch ID.

**Integrated with Your Devices**

Easily share files, photos, and more with your iPhone and iPad using Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages.

**Durable Build and Free Software Updates**

Built with an all-aluminum unibody enclosure and backed by free software updates for years to come.

**Configuration**

* Color: Space Gray
* Unified Memory: 16GB
* Storage: 512GB SSD

**Order Your Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop Today!**

**Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop**

**Unleash Your Creative Potential**

Take your productivity and creativity to the next level with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. This powerful machine is designed to meet the demands of professionals and enthusiasts alike, with a range of features that make it the perfect tool for anyone who wants to create, innovate, and achieve more.

**Choose Your Power**

The MacBook Pro Laptop comes with two powerful chip options: M2 Pro and M2 Max. The M2 Pro chip features 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and up to 32GB of unified memory, while the M2 Max chip boasts 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, and up to 96GB of unified memory. Whichever option you choose, you can be sure of exceptional performance and efficiency.

**Stunning Display**

The 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display is a marvel of modern technology, with features like Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, and pro reference modes. Whether you're editing videos, designing graphics, or simply enjoying your favorite shows, this display will leave you breathless.

**Capture and Create**

The MacBook Pro Laptop features a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, a three-mic array, and a six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio. This means you can enjoy crystal-clear video calls, record high-quality audio, and immerse yourself in rich, 3D soundscapes.

**Connect and Collaborate**

Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.3, and a range of ports, including Thunderbolt 4, SDXC card slot, HDMI, and a headphone jack. You can also enjoy seamless integration with your iPhone and iPad, thanks to features like Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages.

**Type with Ease**

The Magic Keyboard features a full-height function key row and Touch ID, making it easy to navigate, create, and stay secure.

**Built to Last**

The all-aluminum unibody enclosure is both durable and stylish, and with free software updates for years to come, you can be sure your MacBook Pro Laptop will stay ahead of the curve.

**Specifications:**

* Chip: M2 Pro or M2 Max
* CPU Cores: 12
* GPU Cores: 19 (M2 Pro) or up to 38 (M2 Max)
* Unified Memory: Up to 32GB (M2 Pro) or up to 96GB (M2 Max)
* Display: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR
* Camera: 1080p FaceTime HD
* Audio: Six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio
* Ports: Thunderbolt 4, SDXC card slot, HDMI, headphone jack
* Wireless Connectivity: Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.3
* Keyboard: Magic Keyboard with full-height function key row and Touch ID
* Color: Space Gray
* Memory: 16GB unified memory
* Storage: 512GB SSD
* Battery Life: Up to 22 hours

**Order now and take your creativity to new heights!**
